snippets: Santali farmers traditionally use organic farming methods.
Tribal communities celebrate harvest festivals with traditional dances.
Women in tribal villages often work in agricultural fields.
Traditional tribal houses are made of mud and bamboo.
Santali language uses Ol-Chiki script for writing.
